thread.title: Garner makes first red carpet appearance post split
thread.title_full: Garner makes first red carpet appearance post split

author: NewsWire
title: Garner makes first red carpet appearance post split
text: Added on October 1, 2015 NewsWire Garner makes first red carpet appearance post split 0 0 0 0 0 Los Angeles, Oct 2 (IANS) Actress Jennifer Garner returned to the red carpet after splitting from husband Ben Affleck. The actress looked elegant in a black outfit when attending an charity dinner event of Baby2Baby, an organisation that supplies low-income families with diapers and children’s clothing, at Chanel Boutique here, reports aceshowbiz.com. The 49-year-old wore a sleeveless knee-length dress paired with strappy heels. She was joined at the event by fellow female stars like Rachel Bilson, Ellen Pompeo, Jenna Dewan-Tatum, and Selma Blair. The couple, who got divorced after 10 years of marriage a day after their 10th wedding anniversary on June 30, have three children — Violet, Seraphina and Samuel.
